You can access a listing of all available settings. For a list of deprecated settings see Deprecated settings.

You can find both in the settings reference document.

ADMINSÂ¶

Default: () (Empty tuple)

A tuple that lists people who get code error notifications. When DEBUG=False and a view raises an exception, Django will email these people with the full exception information. Each member of the tuple should be a tuple of (Full name, email address). Example:

(('John', 'john@example.com'), ('Mary', 'mary@example.com'))

Note that Django will email all of these people whenever an error happens. See /howto/virtualenv for more information.

print 'hello world'
